moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Spark
moves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Nuzzle
moves.description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Volt Switch
moves.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.
